ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Now or within the past 3 months: When I feel nervous, it is hard for me to breathe.
Notes: 0=Not True or Hardly Ever True; 1=Somewhat True or Sometimes True; 2=Very True or Often True

ElementDescription: Now or within the past 3 months: I get headaches when I am at school, at work or in public places.
Notes: 0=Not True or Hardly Ever True; 1=Somewhat True or Sometimes True; 2=Very True or Often True

ElementDescription: Now or within the past 3 months: I don't like to be with people I don't know well.
Notes: 0=Not True or Hardly Ever True; 1=Somewhat True or Sometimes True; 2=Very True or Often True

ElementDescription: Now or within the past 3 months: I get nervous if I sleep away from home.
Notes: 0=Not True or Hardly Ever True; 1=Somewhat True or Sometimes True; 2=Very True or Often True

ElementDescription: SCAARED Total Score
Notes: Sum of all 44 SCAARED items; Score of 23 or greater may indicate presence of an Anxiety Disorder

ElementDescription: SCAARED Sub Scale Panic Disorder or Significant Somatic Symptoms
Notes: Sum of scaared01, scaared02, scaared06, scaared09, scaared11, scaared12, scaared15, scaared17, scaared18, scaared19, scaared22, scaared25, scaared28, scaared32, scaared36, scaared38, scaared40; Score of 5 or greater may indicate Panic Disorder or Significant Somatic Symptoms

ElementDescription: SCAARED Sub Scale Generalized Anxiety Disorder
Notes: Sum of scaared05, scaared07, scaared08, scaared14, scaared21, scaared23, scaared24, scaared29, scaared31, scaared35, scaared37, scaared39, scaared44; Score of 12 or greater may indicate Generalized Anxiety Disorder

ElementDescription: SCAARED Sub Scale Separation Anxiety Disorder
Notes: Sum of scaared04, scaared13, scaared16, scaared20, scaared26, scaared30, scaared33; Score of 3 or greater may indicate Separation Anxiety Disorder

ElementDescription: SCAARED Sub Scale Social Phobia Disorder
Notes: Sum of scaared03, scaared10, scaared27, scaared34, scaared41, scaared42, scaared43; Score of 7 or greater may indicate Social Phobia Disorder
